title.en: Even Though I’m Part of the Onee-Shota Faction, I’m Being Attacked by a Shota

altTitles.ja: おねショタ派なのに、ショタに攻められるお姉さん

altTitles.ja-ro: Onee-Shota Ha Nano ni, Shota ni Semeraru Onee-san

biography.en:
**Name In Native Language:** ウンポーコ (unpōko)

**Other Associated Names:**
unpocoooo
unpooko
unpoco
